title: Ruling on Drawing Live Creatures Living/Nonliving | Sheikh Assim Al Hakeem
transcript: xena from the US she says what's the ruling on drawing live creatures whether they're alive meaning that a dog a cat a lion or something that we make up and create like Mickey Mouse for example or like a spongebob something that does not exist but we give it life we give it a face and eyes and nose this is totally prohibited the Prophet said alayhi salaatu said i mean an authentic hadith in Asahi the most tormented people on the day of judgment are those who create such pictures Allah will tell them give life to what you have created and they won't be able to do that so this is totally prohibited
